name: Beaks in the Park - One Page RPG
name_original: Beaks in the Park - One Page RPG
description:
Once upon a time, the sun exploded, and ghosts had nowhere to go for some reason. So now the city park huddles under perpetual shadow and dimly lit, demon blood-fueled streetlamps. Only one faction can hope to control the border between the chaos of the City and the hidden mysteries of the Park.
You are among the smart, the talented, the ruthless.
You are a pigeon.
